name: py-vsts-cd-manager
description: Python wrapper around some of the VSTS APIs.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-msrest
dependencies.description: AutoRest swagger generator Python client runtime.

dependencies.name: py-mock
dependencies.description:
mock is a library for testing in Python. It allows you to replace parts
of your system under test with mock objects and make assertions about
how they have been used.
